name: mansion-pos
description: ระบบจัดการแมนชั่นรายวัน (Mansion POS)

scripts.init-db: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const mysql=require('mysql2/promise');(async()=>{const dbConfig=process.env.DATABASE_URL||{host:process.env.MYSQLHOST||process.env.MYSQL_HOST||'localhost',port:parseInt(process.env.MYSQLPORT||process.env.MYSQL_PORT||'3306'),user:process.env.MYSQLUSER||process.env.MYSQL_USER||'root',password:process.env.MYSQLPASSWORD||process.env.MYSQL_PASSWORD||'167349943167',multipleStatements:true};const c=await mysql.createConnection(dbConfig);const sql=fs.readFileSync('init-db.sql','utf8');await c.query(sql);console.log('Database initialized!');await c.end();})()"
